name: Phase Strike
flavor: For a moment, your foe slips out of phase with this manifold.

metadata.flavor: For a moment, your foe slips out of phase with this manifold.

effects.tier1: 3 + A psychic damage; I < WEAK, the target goes out of phase (save ends)
effects.tier2: 4 + A psychic damage; I < AVERAGE, the target goes out of phase (save ends)
effects.tier3: 6 + A psychic damage; I < STRONG, the target goes out of phase (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A target who goes out of phase is slowed, has their stability reduced by 2, and can't obtain a tier 3 outcome on ability rolls.
